Package leitej.xml.om

Class Xmlom

  • java.lang.Object
    • leitej.xml.om.Xmlom
  • public final class Xmlom
extends java.lang.Object
    An useful class to help in XML Object Modelling stream.
    Author:
    Julio Leite
    See Also:
    XmlomWriter, XmlomReader

      java.util.List<I>      		 getConfig​(java.lang.Class<I> interfaceClass, java.nio.charset.Charset charset, I[] defaultContent)
      Reads the configuration file in default file for the interfaceClass.If does not exist, write the default one, and gives it as return.
      If configuration file has obfuscated parameters unprotected, it will be rewritten to obfuscate it.

      • isSerializationObfustated

        public static <I extends XmlObjectModelling> boolean isSerializationObfustated​(I obj)
        Check data in obj with obfuscated annotation if is in obfuscated state. If no data has to be obfuscated this method returns true.

        Attention: this method iterates through all linked XmlObjectModelling recursively starting from obj, it is protected to not check the same link twice.
        Parameters:
        obj - xmlom to check
        Returns:
        false if there is data that has be obfuscated and was load in plain state

      • sendToFile

        public static <I extends XmlObjectModelling> void sendToFile​(java.io.File file,
                                                             I obj)
                                                      throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                                             java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                             java.lang.SecurityException,
                                                             java.io.IOException
        Saves the object to a file with the Constant.UTF8_CHARSET_NAME.
        This method will try to create the file if not exists.
        Parameters:
        file -
        obj - object to be saved
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the file exists but is a directory rather than a regular file, does not exist but cannot be created, or cannot be opened for any other reason.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the filename argument is null
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurred
        java.lang.SecurityException - If a security manager exists and its checkRead method does not permit verification of the existence of the named directory and all necessary parent directories; or if the checkWrite method does not permit the named directory and all necessary parent directories to be created; or if a security manager exists and its checkWrite method denies write access to the file

        public static <I extends XmlObjectModelling> void sendToFile​(java.io.File file,

        Saves the objects to a file.
        This method will try to create the file if not exists.
        Parameters:
        file -
        charset -
        minified - when false produces a human readable XML, other wise outputs a clean strait line
        objs - objects to be saved
        Throws:

        public static <I extends XmlObjectModelling> void sendToStream​(java.io.OutputStream os,
                                                               boolean minified,
                                                               I[] objs)
                                                        throws java.io.IOException

        minified - when false produces a human readable XML, other wise outputs a clean strait line
        objs - to write to the stream
        Throws:

                                                                                  java.lang.SecurityException,

                                                                                  XmlInvalidLtException,
                                                                                  java.io.IOException
        Reads all objects from the file in Constant.UTF8_CHARSET_NAME.
        Parameters:
        interfaceClass - type of object to be ridden
        file -
        Returns:
        all the ridden objects
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the file does not exist, is a directory rather than a regular file, or for some other reason cannot be opened for reading
        java.lang.SecurityException - If a security manager exists and its checkRead method denies read access to the file.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the pathname argument is null; or if trustClass has a class null
        XmlInvalidLtException - If is reading a corrupted XML
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs

      • getConfig

        public static <I extends XmlObjectModelling> java.util.List<I> getConfig​(java.lang.Class<I> interfaceClass)
                                                                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                                         java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                                                         java.lang.SecurityException,
                                                                         java.io.IOException,
                                                                         XmlInvalidLtException
        Reads the content of configuration file in default file for the interfaceClass. With charset Constant.UTF8_CHARSET_NAME. If does not exist, write a standard one as an example, and return null.
        If configuration file has obfuscated parameters unprotected, it will be rewritten to obfuscate it.
        Parameters:
        interfaceClass -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If default filename results in a directory rather than a regular file, or for some other reason cannot be opened for reading
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurred
        XmlInvalidLtException - If is reading a corrupted XML
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the default filename for interfaceClass results in null
        java.lang.SecurityException - If a security manager exists and it denies read or write

        charset -
        standardContent -
        Returns:

      • getConfig

        public static <I extends XmlObjectModelling> java.util.List<I> getConfig​(java.lang.Class<I> interfaceClass,
                                                                         I[] defaultContent)
                                                                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                                         java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                                                         java.lang.SecurityException,
                                                                         java.io.IOException,
                                                                         XmlInvalidLtException
        Reads the content of configuration file in default file for the interfaceClass. With charset Constant.UTF8_CHARSET_NAME. If does not exist, write the default one, and gives it as return.
        If configuration file has obfuscated parameters unprotected, it will be rewritten to obfuscate it.
        Parameters:
        interfaceClass -
        defaultContent -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If default location is a directory rather than a regular file, or for some other reason cannot be opened for reading
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If interfaceClass is null
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurred
        java.lang.SecurityException - If a security manager exists and it denies read or write
        XmlInvalidLtException - If is reading a corrupted XML

        Reads the configuration file in default file for the interfaceClass.If does not exist, write the default one, and gives it as return.
        If configuration file has obfuscated parameters unprotected, it will be rewritten to obfuscate it.
        Parameters:
        interfaceClass -
        charset -
        defaultContent -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If default location is a directory rather than a regular file, or for some other reason cannot be opened for reading
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs
        XmlInvalidLtException - If is reading a corrupted XML
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If any of arguments is null, except defaultContent
        java.lang.SecurityException - If a security manager exists and it denies read or write

      • getConfig

        public static <I extends XmlObjectModelling> java.util.List<I> getConfig​(java.lang.Class<I> interfaceClass,
                                                                         java.io.File fromFile,
                                                                         java.nio.charset.Charset charset,
                                                                         boolean rewriteIfNotObfuscated,
                                                                         I[] defaultContent,
                                                                         I exampleContent)
                                                                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                                         java.lang.SecurityException,
                                                                         java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                                                         XmlInvalidLtException,
                                                                         java.io.IOException
        Reads the content of configuration file. If does not exist, write the example and the default one, and gives the default as return.
        Parameters:
        interfaceClass -
        fromFile -
        charset -
        rewriteIfNotObfuscated -
        defaultContent -
        exampleContent -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If fromFile is a directory rather than a regular file, or for some other reason cannot be opened for reading
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs
        XmlInvalidLtException - If is reading a corrupted XML
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If any of arguments is null, except defaultContent and exampleContent
        java.lang.SecurityException - If a security manager exists and it denies read or write
